entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
